title: Table 5. Respondents' Perceptions of Chain of Command Support
questions:
Promote a unit climate based on “respect and
trust”
Refrain from sexist comments and behaviors
Actively discourage sexist comments and behaviors

Provide sexual assault prevention and response
training that interests and engages you

Encourage bystander intervention to assist others
in situations at risk for sexual assault or other
harmful behavior
Encourage victims to report sexual assault

Create an environment where victims feel comfortable
reporting sexual assault
